metadata.title: CVE-2023-5367 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A out-of-bounds write flaw was found in the xorg-x11-server. This issueoccurs due to an incorrect calculation of a buffer offset when copying datastored in the heap in the XIChangeDeviceProperty function inXi/xiproperty.c and in RRChangeOutputProperty function inrandr/rrproperty.c, allowing for possible escalation of privileges ordenial of service.

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
